data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lu, Lin, Zhang, Yalin (2018): Taxonomy of the Oriental leafhopper genus Favintiga Webb (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae: Drabescini) with description of a new species from China. Zootaxa 4370 (4): 446-450, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4370.4.10|3 occurrences
